patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@
 /* Custom CSS for Jazzmin logos */
 .custom-logo-size {
     max-width: 200px; /* Adjust the width as needed */
-    height: auto;     /* Keeps the aspect ratio */
+    height: 200px;     /* Keeps the aspect ratio */
 }

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -9,6 +9,6 @@
 }
 
 .custom-logo-size {
     width: 150px !important; /* Adjust width */
-    height: auto !important; /* Maintain aspect ratio */
+    height: 10px !important; /* Maintain aspect ratio */
 }

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -8,7 +8,7 @@
     border-radius: 50%; /* Ensure the image is circular */
 }
 
 .custom-logo-size {
-    width: 150px !important; /* Adjust width */
+    width: 10px !important; /* Adjust width */
     height: 10px !important; /* Maintain aspect ratio */
 }

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -2,9 +2,9 @@
 #login-form, .card, .auth-card {
     max-width: 350px !important; /* Smaller width */
     margin: 10% auto !important; /* Center the box */
     padding: 20px !important;
-    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) !important; /* Light transparent background */
+    background-color: rgba(157, 28, 28, 0.8) !important; /* Light transparent background */
     border-radius: 10px !important;
     box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) !important; /* Add depth */
     backdrop-filter: blur(10px) !important; /* Blurred effect */
 }

Index:

+++

 img {
-

+    height: auto !important;
     border-radius: 50%; /* Ensure the image is circular */
 
 }
